Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String For valid options MUST return a valid signature string.
Canonicalize.title: For valid options MUST return a valid signature string.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String If a value is not the last value then append an ASCII newline.
Canonicalize.title: If a value is not the last value then append an ASCII newline.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String if duplicate parameters the last parameter defined MUST be used.
Canonicalize.title: if duplicate parameters the last parameter defined MUST be used.

 canonicalize command failed : DataError:  was not found in `requestOptions.headers`

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter SHOULD be a lowercased, quoted list of HTTP header fields,separated by a single space character.
Canonicalize.title: SHOULD be a lowercased, quoted list of HTTP header fields,separated by a single space character.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter The client MUST use the values of each HTTP header field in the headers Signature Parameter, in the order they appear in the headers Signature Parameter.
Canonicalize.title: The client MUST use the values of each HTTP header field in the headers Signature Parameter, in the order they appear in the headers Signature Parameter.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter All header field values associated with the header field MUST be concatenated, separated by an ASCII comma and an ASCII space, and used in the order in which they will appear in the transmitted HTTP message.
Canonicalize.title: All header field values associated with the header field MUST be concatenated, separated by an ASCII comma and an ASCII space, and used in the order in which they will appear in the transmitted HTTP message.
Canonicalize.errors: expected signature string to match: expected 'host: example.com\nduplicate: two' to equal 'host: example.com\nduplicate: one, two'

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If a header specified in the headers parameter cannot be matched with a provided header in the message, the implementation MUST produce an error.
Canonicalize.title: If a header specified in the headers parameter cannot be matched with a provided header in the message, the implementation MUST produce an error.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If a header specified in the headers parameter is malformed the implementation MUST produce an error.
Canonicalize.title: If a header specified in the headers parameter is malformed the implementation MUST produce an error.
Canonicalize.errors: Expected an error to be thrown: expected null to exist

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If the header value is a zero-length string, the signature string line correlating with that header will simply be the (lowercased) header name, an ASCII colon :, and an ASCII space.
Canonicalize.title: If the header value is a zero-length string, the signature string line correlating with that header will simply be the (lowercased) header name, an ASCII colon :, and an ASCII space.

 canonicalize command failed : DataError: zero was not found in `requestOptions.headers`

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter SHOULD change capitalized Headers to lowercase.
Canonicalize.title: SHOULD change capitalized Headers to lowercase.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If the header field name is (request-target) then generate the header field value by concatenating the lowercased :method, an ASCII space, and the :path pseudo-headers.
Canonicalize.title: If the header field name is (request-target) then generate the header field value by concatenating the lowercased :method, an ASCII space, and the :path pseudo-headers.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter SHOULD return "" if the headers paramter is empty.
Canonicalize.title: SHOULD return "" if the headers paramter is empty.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If the header parameter is not specified, implementations MUST operate as if the field were specified with a single value, (created), in the list of HTTP headers.
Canonicalize.title: If the header parameter is not specified, implementations MUST operate as if the field were specified with a single value, (created), in the list of HTTP headers.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If (created) is in headers & the algorithm param starts with rsa MUST produce an error.
Canonicalize.title: If (created) is in headers & the algorithm param starts with rsa MUST produce an error.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If (created) is in headers & the algorithm param starts with hmac MUST produce an error.
Canonicalize.title: If (created) is in headers & the algorithm param starts with hmac MUST produce an error.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If (created) is in headers & the algorithm param starts with ecdsa MUST produce an error.
Canonicalize.title: If (created) is in headers & the algorithm param starts with ecdsa MUST produce an error.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If the created Signature Parameter is not specified, an implementation MUST produce an error.
Canonicalize.title: If the created Signature Parameter is not specified, an implementation MUST produce an error.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If the created Signature Parameter is not an integer or unix timestamp, animplementation MUST produce an error.
Canonicalize.title: If the created Signature Parameter is not an integer or unix timestamp, animplementation MUST produce an error.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If given valid options SHOULD return (created).
Canonicalize.title: If given valid options SHOULD return (created).

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If (expires) is in headers & the algorithm param starts with rsa MUST produce an error.
Canonicalize.title: If (expires) is in headers & the algorithm param starts with rsa MUST produce an error.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If (expires) is in headers & the algorithm param starts with hmac MUST produce an error.
Canonicalize.title: If (expires) is in headers & the algorithm param starts with hmac MUST produce an error.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If (expires) is in headers & the algorithm param starts with ecdsa MUST produce an error.
Canonicalize.title: If (expires) is in headers & the algorithm param starts with ecdsa MUST produce an error.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If the expires Signature Parameter is not specified, an implementation MUST produce an error.
Canonicalize.title: If the expires Signature Parameter is not specified, an implementation MUST produce an error.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If the expires Signature Parameter is not an integer or unix timestamp, animplementation MUST produce an error.
Canonicalize.title: If the expires Signature Parameter is not an integer or unix timestamp, animplementation MUST produce an error.

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Signature String Header Parameter If given valid options SHOULD return (expires).

Canonicalize.fullTitle: Optional should be able to parse json
Canonicalize.title: should be able to parse json

Sign.fullTitle: A client MUST generate a signature by base 64 encoding the output of the digital signature algorithm.
Sign.title: A client MUST generate a signature by base 64 encoding the output of the digital signature algorithm.

Sign.fullTitle: A client MUST use the headers and algorithm values as well as the contents of the HTTP message, to create the signature string.
Sign.title: A client MUST use the headers and algorithm values as well as the contents of the HTTP message, to create the signature string.

Sign.fullTitle: A client MUST use the key associated with keyId togenerate a digital signature on the signature string.
Sign.title: A client MUST use the key associated with keyId togenerate a digital signature on the signature string.

Sign.fullTitle: MUST be able to discover metadata about the key from the keyId.
Sign.title: MUST be able to discover metadata about the key from the keyId.

Sign.fullTitle: MUST NOT process a signature with a created timestamp value that is in the future.
Sign.title: MUST NOT process a signature with a created timestamp value that is in the future.

Sign.fullTitle: MUST NOT process a signature with an expires timestamp value that is in the past.
Sign.title: MUST NOT process a signature with an expires timestamp value that is in the past.

Sign.fullTitle: Algorithm Parameter MUST produce an error if algorithm parameter differs from key metadata.
Sign.title: MUST produce an error if algorithm parameter differs from key metadata.

Sign.fullTitle: Algorithm Parameter Signature scheme MUST be in the HTTP Signatures Algorithms Registry.
Sign.title: Signature scheme MUST be in the HTTP Signatures Algorithms Registry.

Sign.fullTitle: Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST sign for algorithm hs2019.
Sign.title: MUST sign for algorithm hs2019.

Sign.fullTitle: Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha1.
Sign.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha1.

Sign.fullTitle: Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha256.
Sign.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha256.

Sign.fullTitle: Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm hmac-sha256.
Sign.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm hmac-sha256.

Sign.fullTitle: Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm ecdsa-sha256.
Sign.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm ecdsa-sha256.

Sign.fullTitle: Private Keys should sign with a/an RSA private key.
Sign.title: should sign with a/an RSA private key.

Sign.fullTitle: Private Keys should sign with a/an P256 private key.
Sign.title: should sign with a/an P256 private key.

Sign.fullTitle: Private Keys should sign with a/an ED25519 private key.
Sign.title: should sign with a/an ED25519 private key.

Sign.fullTitle: Private Keys should sign with a/an ECDSA private key.
Sign.title: should sign with a/an ECDSA private key.

Verify.fullTitle: MUST derive the digital signature algorithm fromthe metadata associated with the keyId.
Verify.title: MUST derive the digital signature algorithm fromthe metadata associated with the keyId.

Verify.fullTitle: MUST NOT use the value of algorithm from the signed message.
Verify.title: MUST NOT use the value of algorithm from the signed message.

Verify.fullTitle: A server MUST use the received HTTP message, the headers value, and the Signature String Construction algorithm to recreate the signature.
Verify.title: A server MUST use the received HTTP message, the headers value, and the Signature String Construction algorithm to recreate the signature.

Verify.fullTitle: A server MUST use the algorithm, keyId, and base 64 decoded signature listed in the Signature Parameters to verify the authenticity of the digital signature.
Verify.title: A server MUST use the algorithm, keyId, and base 64 decoded signature listed in the Signature Parameters to verify the authenticity of the digital signature.

Verify.fullTitle: If a header specified in the headers value of the Signature Parameters (or the default item (created) where the headers value is not supplied) is absent from the message, the implementation MUST produce an error.
Verify.title: If a header specified in the headers value of the Signature Parameters (or the default item (created) where the headers value is not supplied) is absent from the message, the implementation MUST produce an error.

Verify.fullTitle: Public Keys should verify for a RSA public key
Verify.title: should verify for a RSA public key

Verify.fullTitle: Public Keys should verify for a P256 public key
Verify.title: should verify for a P256 public key

Verify.fullTitle: Public Keys should verify for a ED25519 public key
Verify.title: should verify for a ED25519 public key

Verify.fullTitle: Public Keys should verify for a ECDSA public key
Verify.title: should verify for a ECDSA public key

Verify.fullTitle: Algorithm Parameter MUST produce an error if algorithm parameter differs from key metadata.
Verify.title: MUST produce an error if algorithm parameter differs from key metadata.

Verify.fullTitle: Algorithm Parameter Signature scheme MUST be in the HTTP Signatures Algorithms Registry.
Verify.title: Signature scheme MUST be in the HTTP Signatures Algorithms Registry.

Verify.fullTitle: Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST not reject algorithm hs2019.
Verify.title: MUST not reject algorithm hs2019.

Verify.fullTitle: Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha1.
Verify.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha1.

Verify.fullTitle: Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha256.
Verify.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha256.

Verify.fullTitle: Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm hmac-sha256.
Verify.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm hmac-sha256.

Verify.fullTitle: Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm ecdsa-sha256.
Verify.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm ecdsa-sha256.
